thread.section_title: Gardner-White Furniture Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Gardner-White Furniture | www.gardner-white.com | 18 of 227
thread.title: Kris Sundberg
thread.title_full: Gardner-White Furniture reviewed by Kris Sundberg

author: Kris Sundberg
title: Kris Sundberg
text: My experience was outstanding from the moment I walked into the showroom. I was greeted and asked if I needed any help. I said not at this time. The salesman did not hound me which I truly appreciate. Once the salesman noticed that I had some questions he was there with the answers. Long story short. It was an enjoyable experience. I have to give the delivery guys a shout out as well. They were professional and courteous as well as on time.
